<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Handle a disconnection from the underlying transport. No further messages</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// should be sent to handleMessage after this is called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Err may contain an Error value indicating unexpected disconnection. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// allows clients to log such errors, but no attempt should be made at</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// recovery (which should be handled inside the transport class, if it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
